details: The Audi Q5 is a luxurious compact SUV offering a refined balance of performance and comfort. Equipped with a turbocharged engine, it provides a smooth, responsive driving experience with premium interior finishes. It also boasts advanced safety features and intuitive tech, including a virtual cockpit. Available at Audi Québec at 1900 Boulevard Laurier Ouest, Quebec City, QC, and Audi West Island, 3170 Boulevard de la Côte-Vertu, Montreal, QC

The BMW 3 Series is a sleek, sporty sedan designed for driving enthusiasts who seek a dynamic performance with everyday practicality. With an engaging handling experience, luxurious interiors, and cutting-edge technology, it stands out in its class. The 3 Series combines classic BMW styling with modern features. You can find it at BMW Sainte-Julie, 1750 Rue Principale, Sainte-Julie, QC, and BMW de Laval, 2850 Boulevard le Carrefour, Laval, QC.

The Mercedes-Benz E-Class Executive is a sophisticated sedan with an emphasis on luxury, technology, and performance. Featuring a smooth ride, plush interior, and a wealth of tech innovations like a widescreen cockpit and advanced driver assistance systems, the E-Class is perfect for those who demand the finest. Visit Mercedes-Benz of Quebec, 555 Boulevard de l'Aeroport, Quebec City, QC, or Mercedes-Benz Montreal, 3200 Rue Jean-Talon O, Montreal, QC.
